products.name: YieldMax Optimizer Vault
products.description: Our flagship vault for maximizing stablecoin yields through a diversified strategy.

products.name: Liquidity Provision Fund
products.description: Provide liquidity to decentralized exchanges and earn fees.

products.name: YLD Staking Pool
products.description: Stake YLD tokens to earn protocol fees and governance rights.

faqs.question: What are the risks involved with YieldFi products?
faqs.answer: All DeFi investments carry risks, including smart contract vulnerabilities and market volatility. We conduct regular audits and implement security measures, but please invest responsibly. More details: https://docs.yield.fi/security/risks

faqs.question: How often is APY updated?
faqs.answer: APY figures are typically updated daily, reflecting the latest performance data. However, past performance is not indicative of future results.

faqs.question: What is YLD token?
faqs.answer: YLD is the native governance token of the YieldFi ecosystem. It allows holders to participate in protocol decisions and potentially earn staking rewards. Read more: https://docs.yield.fi/yld-token

faqs.question: How does YieldFi ensure security?
faqs.answer: YieldFi employs state-of-the-art multi-layered security protocols, including regular third-party audits, bug bounty programs, and time-locked contracts. All smart contracts are open-source and have been audited by leading security firms.

faqs.question: What chains does YieldFi support?
faqs.answer: YieldFi currently supports Ethereum and Polygon, with plans to expand to Arbitrum and Optimism in Q3 2025.

general_info.about_us: YieldFi is a decentralized finance protocol focused on providing sustainable and optimized yield generation strategies for its users. We prioritize security, transparency, and community governance.
general_info.mission: To make DeFi accessible and profitable for everyone through innovative financial products and a robust ecosystem.

security_features: Multi-signature wallets for all treasury operations
Bug bounty program with rewards up to $250,000

tokenomics.vesting_schedule: Team and investor tokens are subject to a 3-year vesting schedule with a 1-year cliff.
